title: Navaratan Kundan Antique Finish Haaram - A Royal Masterpiece
features: This breathtaking Haaram features a stunning Kundan setting meticulously handcrafted by artisans in Hyderabad. The intricate design showcases a central square Ruby, framed by sparkling Polki diamonds. Flanking it are three pendants of emeralds with diamond accents, creating a regal Navaratan effect. The chain features a repetitive wave pattern with diamond settings.
colors: accentuated by the rich red of the Ruby
the vibrant green of the Emeralds
and the dazzling white of the Polki Diamonds. A classic
occasions: and traditional celebrations such as Seemantham or half-saree functions (Voni Karyakramam). Also suitable for high-end social events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Kundan Haaram is a true heirloom piece, representing the pinnacle of Hyderabadi jewelry craftsmanship. The combination of premium materials, exquisite design, and traditional techniques makes it a valuable investment. The Navaratan design is believed to bring prosperity and good fortune, making it not just beautiful but also auspicious.
